customer_addr:

Santa Ana, CA 92701

citations.narrative:
On records review it was found that on the morning of December 10, 2023, an 18-year-old Mallard and a 1.6-year-old
White-faced whistling duck identified as:
"B05027 and B22012, were found deceased from predation. There was feces in the habitat that appeared to be from a
raccoon. Traps were set around the habitat to catch the predator."
An approximate 10 x 12-inch tear in the plastic netting covering the enclosure was found on inspection. The
habitat/enclosure was closed until corrective modifications are completed. To protect birds, all bird enclosures must
restrict other animals from entering the enclosure.
Corrected on December 10, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(iv)  Critical
   
Primary enclosures. 
On records review it was found that on the morning of December 10, 2023, an 18-year-old  Mallard and a 1.6-year-old 
White-faced whistling duck identified as:  
 
"B05027 and B22012, were found deceased from predation. There was feces in the habitat that appeared to be from a 
raccoon. Traps were set around the habitat to catch the predator." 
 
An approximate 10 x 12-inch tear in the plastic netting covering the enclosure was found on inspection. The 
habitat/enclosure was closed until corrective modifications are completed. To protect birds, all bird enclosures must 
restrict other animals from entering the enclosure. 
 
Corrected on December 10, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
